title: can i buy rp with subway gift cards?
body:
i have $20 subway gift cards
can i buy rp with subway gift cards? if i can, how to do buy rp with subway gift cards?

replies.body: Indeed, there is a section in the RP purchase section of the store to select Gift Cards.  Some gift cards are eligible per the [Openbucks Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753254-Cash-and-Gift-Cards-Openbucks-) to help, and your card is on there!  Let me know if you have any questions.
